detaileddescription.para: If there are no blocked cells/obstacles then we can just find the exact value of h without any pre-computation using the distance formula/Euclidean Distance all memory errors checks foe cuda are in debug mode ! $ g++ -std=c++0x main.cpp -pthread nvcc -o random_gen_example random_gen_example.cu -lcurand divide the point cloud data into small region called bubles a N pt cloud is divided into N/k where k is the window size , for each subarea , inti a substarting node explore (like running the normal A star on that subgroups nodes) with one setp the surouding and at each step , synchonize all subregions

simplesect.para: for the multithreding and concurrency support computations support the c++ 11 standard is required More Info : https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/thread https://github.com/arvkr/ransac_cuda_eecse4750
: 3D visulisation and rending is enabled only throut VTK,wich should be installed , we use VTK version 9.3.1, for more information refre to VTK installation guide
